## Discussion

When this setting is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] (the default), and the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoSettings/isDualCameraDualPhotoDeliveryEnabled] setting is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], dual photo capture doesn’t deliver additional data.

If you change this setting to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhoto] results from a dual photo capture include [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCameraCalibrationData] objects that describe the imaging parameters for each camera. This data can be useful for performing computer vision tasks on the resulting images.

# isCameraCalibrationDataDeliveryEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether a dual photo capture also delivers camera calibration data.

## Declaration

```swift
var isCameraCalibrationDataDeliveryEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When this setting is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] (the default), and the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoSettings/isDualCameraDualPhotoDeliveryEnabled] setting is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], dual photo capture doesn’t deliver additional data.

If you change this setting to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhoto] results from a dual photo capture include [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCameraCalibrationData] objects that describe the imaging parameters for each camera. This data can be useful for performing computer vision tasks on the resulting images.

## Configuring photo settings

- **flashMode**: A setting for whether to fire the flash when capturing photos.
- **isAutoRedEyeReductionEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to use auto red-eye reduction on flash captures.
- **maxPhotoDimensions**: The maximum resolution of the photo to capture.
- **photoQualityPrioritization**: A setting that indicates how to prioritize photo quality against speed of photo delivery.
- **isAutoContentAwareDistortionCorrectionEnabled**: A Boolean value that specifies whether the photo output, at its discretion, uses content-aware distortion correction on this photo request.
- **isAutoVirtualDeviceFusionEnabled**: A Boolean value that specifies whether to use automatic virtual-device image fusion.
- **virtualDeviceConstituentPhotoDeliveryEnabledDevices**: The constituent devices for which the virtual device should deliver photos.
- **isDualCameraDualPhotoDeliveryEnabled**: A Boolean value that determines whether a dual camera device delivers images from both cameras.
- **isAutoDualCameraFusionEnabled**: A Boolean value that specifies whether captures automatically combine data from a dual camera device.
- **isAutoStillImageStabilizationEnabled**: A Boolean value that specifies whether captures use automatic image stabilization.
- **isHighResolutionPhotoEnabled**: A Boolean value that specifies whether to capture still images at the highest resolution supported by the active device and format.
